description:
Final exams are coming and then Christmas Eve. In another happier time, it would have been an evening for couples. But for Unit 5121? A stark reminder another year has passed.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: After You Left: I Guess Everything Reminds You of Something
Kimi sarishi nochi - I Guess Everything Reminds You Of Something -
君去りし後 - I Guess Everything Reminds You Of Something -
너를 잃은 후: I Guess Everything Reminds You Of Something
